Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ImmunoCAP Allergen Components, modular quantitative in vitro assay for allergen specific IgE measurement in serum/plasma using Phadia platforms
Indications for Use Summary: Aid in the clinical diagnosis of IgE mediated allergic disorders by quantitative measurement of allergen specific IgE in serum or plasma (EDTA or Na-Heparin) using Phadia instruments, for in vitro diagnostic use in clinical laboratories
